trans-unit.source: Causes the compiler to emit a warning when a Prelude numeric conversion converts a type T to the same type T; such calls are probably no-ops and can be omitted. The functions checked for are: toInteger, toRational, fromIntegral, and realToFrac.
trans-unit.target: 当Prelude数字转换将类型 T 转换为相同的类型 T 时，使编译器发出警告；这样的调用可能是无操作的，因此可以省略。检查的函数为： toInteger ， toRational ， fromIntegral 和 realToFrac 。

trans-unit.source: Causes the compiler to emit a warning when a module or interface file in the current directory is shadowing one with the same module name in a library or other directory.
trans-unit.target: 当当前目录下的模块或接口文件在库或其他目录下与相同模块名的文件产生影子时,导致编译器发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Causes the finalizers associated with a foreign pointer to be run immediately.
trans-unit.target: 导致与外来指针相关联的定标器被立即运行。

trans-unit.source: Causes the finalizers associated with a foreign pointer to be run immediately. The foreign pointer must not be used again after this function is called. If the foreign pointer does not support finalizers, this is a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 使与外来指针相关联的定标器立即运行。调用此函数后,不得再使用外来指针。如果外来指针不支持终结器,那么这个函数就不能使用。

trans-unit.source: Causes the output from all of the flags listed below to be dumped to a file. The file name depends upon the output produced; for instance, output from -ddump-simpl will end up in module.dump-simpl.
trans-unit.target: 使以下列出的所有标志的输出转储到文件中。文件名取决于产生的输出。例如， -ddump-simpl 的输出将最终在 module.dump-simpl 。

trans-unit.source: Caution: index necessarily delays retrieving the requested element until the result is forced. It can therefore lead to a space leak if the result is stored, unforced, in another structure. To retrieve an element immediately without forcing it, use lookup or (!?).
trans-unit.target: 注意： index 必须延迟检索请求的元素，直到强制执行结果为止。因此，如果结果未经强制存储在另一个结构中，则可能导致空间泄漏。要立即检索一个元素而不强制它，请使用 lookup 或 (!?) 。

trans-unit.source: Caveat for POSIX systems: This function returns a timestamp with sub-second resolution only if this package is compiled against unix-2.6.0.0 or later and the underlying filesystem supports them.
trans-unit.target: 针对POSIX系统的警告：仅当此程序包针对 unix-2.6.0.0 或更高版本进行编译且基础文件系统支持它们时，此函数才返回具有亚秒级分辨率的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Class and type-family instance declarations are simply added to the list of available instances, with one exception. Since you might want to re-define one, a class instance replaces any earlier instance with an identical head. You aren’t allowed to re-define a type family instance, since it might not be type safe to do so. Instead, re-define the whole type-family. (See Type families.) For example:
trans-unit.target: 仅将类和类型家族实例声明添加到可用实例列表中，只有一个例外。由于您可能想重新定义一个实例，因此一个类实例将用相同的头部替换任何较早的实例。不允许您重新定义类型族实例，因为这样做可能不安全。而是，重新定义整个类型族。（请参阅类型族。）例如：

trans-unit.source: Close all file descriptors except stdin, stdout and stderr in the new process (on Windows, only works if std_in, std_out, and std_err are all Inherit). This implementation will call close an every fd from 3 to the maximum of open files, which can be slow for high maximum of open files.
trans-unit.target: 关闭新进程中除stdin、stdout和stderr以外的所有文件描述符(在Windows上,只有当std_in、std_out和std_err都是Inherit时才有效)。这个实现会在3到最大打开文件数的范围内,每隔一个fd就会调用关闭一个文件,这对于最大打开文件数较多的情况下会比较慢。

trans-unit.source: Close the stream's file descriptor without passing a Handle. On POSIX systems this may lead to strange behavior in the child process because attempting to read or write after the file has been closed throws an error. This should only be used with child processes that don't use the file descriptor at all. If you wish to ignore the child process's output you should either create a pipe and drain it manually or pass a Handle that writes to /dev/null.
trans-unit.target: 在不传递句柄的情况下关闭流的文件描述符。在POSIX系统上，这可能导致子进程中的异常行为，因为在关闭文件后尝试读取或写入会引发错误。这仅应用于完全不使用文件描述符的子进程。如果您希望忽略子进程的输出，则应该创建一个管道并手动将其 Handle ，或者传递一个写入 /dev/null 的Handle。

trans-unit.source: Close this file descriptor. May throw an exception if this is an invalid descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 关闭这个文件描述符。如果这是一个无效的描述符,可能会抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Code coverage tools allow a programmer to determine what parts of their code have been actually executed, and which parts have never actually been invoked. GHC has an option for generating instrumented code that records code coverage as part of the Haskell Program Coverage (HPC) toolkit, which is included with GHC. HPC tools can be used to render the generated code coverage information into human understandable format.
trans-unit.target: 代码覆盖工具允许程序员确定他们的代码中哪些部分已经被实际执行,哪些部分从未被实际调用。GHC有一个选项用于生成记录代码覆盖率的工具代码,作为GHC中包含的Haskell程序覆盖率(HPC)工具包的一部分。HPC工具可以用来将生成的代码覆盖率信息渲染成人类可以理解的格式。

trans-unit.source: Command line

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments are either options or file names.
trans-unit.target: 命令行参数是选项或文件名。

trans-unit.source: Command-line options begin with -. They may not be grouped: -vO is different from -v -O. Options need not precede filenames: e.g., ghc *.o -o foo. All options are processed and then applied to all files; you cannot, for example, invoke ghc -c -O1 Foo.hs -O2 Bar.hs to apply different optimisation levels to the files Foo.hs and Bar.hs.
trans-unit.target: 命令行选项以 - 开头。它们可能未分组： -vO 与 -v -O 不同。选项不必在文件名之前：例如 ghc *.o -o foo 。处理所有选项，然后将其应用于所有文件；你不能，例如，调用 ghc -c -O1 Foo.hs -O2 Bar.hs 不同的优化级别适用于文件 Foo.hs 和 Bar.hs 。

trans-unit.source: Commands produce values, but (like monadic computations) may yield more than one value, or none, and may do other things as well. For the most part, familiarity with monadic notation is a good guide to using commands. However the values of expressions, even monadic ones, are determined by the values of the variables they contain; this is not necessarily the case for commands.
trans-unit.target: 命令产生值,但(像单项计算一样)可能产生多个值,或者没有,也可能做其他事情。在大多数情况下,熟悉单项符号是使用命令的良好指南。然而表达式的值,即使是一元的表达式,也是由它们所包含的变量的值决定的;而命令则不一定是这样。

trans-unit.source: Commands that query the package database (list, latest, describe, field, dot) operate on the list of databases specified by the flags --user, --global, and --package-db. If none of these flags are given, the default is --global --user.
trans-unit.target: 查询软件包数据库的命令（列表，最新，描述，字段，点）在由 --user ，-- --global 和 --package-db 标志指定的数据库列表上运行。如果没有给出这些标志，则默认值为 --global --user 。

trans-unit.source: Common examples of lazy corecursive reduction are functions that map and flatten a structure to a lazy stream of result values, i.e. an iterator over the transformed input elements. In such cases, it is important to choose a Foldable method that is lazy in the tail of the structure, such as foldr (or foldMap, if the result Monoid has a lazy mappend as with e.g. ByteString Builders).
trans-unit.target: 惰性核心递归约简的常见示例是将结构映射和平坦化为结果值的惰性流（即，经过转换的输入元素上的迭代器）的函数。在这种情况下，重要的是选择在结构的尾部是惰性的 Foldable 方法，例如 foldr （或 foldMap ，如果结果 Monoid 具有像ByteString Builders一样的惰性 mappend ）。

trans-unit.source: Common examples of strict recursive reduction are the various aggregate functions, like sum, product, length, as well as more complex summaries such as frequency counts. These functions return only a single value after processing the entire input structure. In such cases, lazy processing of the tail of the input structure is generally not only unnecessary, but also inefficient. Thus, these and similar folds should be implemented in terms of strict left-associative Foldable methods (typically foldl`) to perform an efficient reduction in constant space.
trans-unit.target: 严格递归约简的常见示例是各种聚合函数，例如 sum ， product ， length 和更复杂的汇总（例如频率计数）。这些函数在处理完整个输入结构后仅返回单个值。在这种情况下，输入结构的尾部的惰性处理通常不仅是不必要的，而且效率很低。因此，这些折叠和类似的折叠应按照严格的左联想 Foldable 方法（通常为 foldl ）实施，以有效地减小恒定空间。

trans-unit.source: Compile via LLVM instead of using the native code generator. This will generally take slightly longer than the native code generator to compile. Produced code is generally the same speed or faster than the other two code generators. Compiling via LLVM requires LLVM’s opt and llc executables to be in PATH.
trans-unit.target: 通过LLVM而不是使用本机代码生成器进行编译。通常，这将比本机代码生成器花费更长的时间来编译。产生的代码通常比其他两个代码生成器具有相同的速度或更快的速度。通过LLVM进行编译需要LLVM的opt和llc可执行文件位于 PATH 中。

trans-unit.source: Compile via LLVM instead of using the native code generator. This will generally take slightly longer than the native code generator to compile. Produced code is generally the same speed or faster than the other two code generators. Compiling via LLVM requires LLVM’s opt and llc executables to be in PATH.
trans-unit.target: 通过LLVM而不是使用本机代码生成器进行编译。通常，这比本机代码生成器的编译时间要长一点。产生的代码通常比其他两个代码生成器具有相同的速度或更快的速度。通过LLVM进行编译需要LLVM的opt和llc可执行文件位于 PATH 中。

trans-unit.source: Compiling this program with NamedWildCards (as well as PartialTypeSignatures) enabled produces the following error message reporting the inferred type of the named wildcard _a.
trans-unit.target: 在启用 NamedWildCards （以及 PartialTypeSignatures ）的情况下编译该程序会产生以下错误消息，报告命名通配符 _a 的推断类型。

trans-unit.source: Compiling this program with -O results in Hello to be printed, despite the fact that evaluate should have bottomed. Compiling with -O -fno-state-hack results in the exception one would expect.
trans-unit.target: 使用 -O 编译该程序会导致打印 Hello ，尽管 evaluate 应该已经触底。使用 -O -fno-state-hack 编译会导致例外。

trans-unit.source: Compiling this program without enabling NamedWildCards produces the following error message complaining about the type variable _a no matching the actual type Bool.
trans-unit.target: 在不启用 NamedWildCards 的情况下编译该程序会产生以下错误消息，抱怨类型变量 _a 与实际类型 Bool 不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Compiling to object code inside GHCi is particularly useful if you are developing a compiled application, because the :reload command typically runs much faster than restarting GHC with --make from the command-line, because all the interface files are already cached in memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在开发已编译的应用程序，则在GHCi内部编译为目标代码特别有用，因为 :reload 命令通常比从命令行使用 --make 重新启动GHC的运行速度快得多，因为所有接口文件已经缓存在内存中。

trans-unit.source: Computation getFullArgs is the "raw" version of getArgs, similar to argv in other languages. It returns a list of the program's command line arguments, starting with the program name, and including those normally eaten by the RTS (+RTS ... -RTS).
trans-unit.target: 计算 getFullArgs 是“原始”版本 getArgs ，类似于 argv 的其他语言。它返回程序命令行参数的列表，从程序名称开始，包括RTS通常吃掉的参数（+ RTS ... -RTS）。

trans-unit.source: Computation hClosehdl makes handle hdl closed. Before the computation finishes, if hdl is writable its buffer is flushed as for hFlush. Performing hClose on a handle that has already been closed has no effect; doing so is not an error. All other operations on a closed handle will fail. If hClose fails for any reason, any further operations (apart from hClose) on the handle will still fail as if hdl had been successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hClose hdl 使句柄 hdl 关闭。在计算完成之前，如果 hdl 是可写的，则其缓冲区与 hFlush 一样被刷新。在已经关闭的句柄上执行 hClose 无效；这样做不是错误。在闭合句柄上的所有其他操作将失败。如果 hClose 由于任何原因失败，则该句柄上的任何其他操作（除 hClose 之外）仍将失败，就像 hdl 已成功关闭一样。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetBufferinghdl returns the current buffering mode for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetBuffering hdl 返回当前缓冲模式 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetCharhdl reads a character from the file or channel managed by hdl, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetChar hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取字符，并阻塞直到有字符可用为止。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetContentshdl returns the list of characters corresponding to the unread portion of the channel or file managed by hdl, which is put into an intermediate state, semi-closed. In this state, hdl is effectively closed, but items are read from hdl on demand and accumulated in a special list returned by hGetContentshdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetContents hdl 返回与由 hdl 管理的通道或文件的未读部分相对应的字符列表，该字符处于半封闭状态，处于中间状态。在这种状态下， hdl 实际上是关闭的，但是根据需要从 hdl 中读取项目，并将其累积在 hGetContents hdl 返回的特殊列表中。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetLinehdl reads a line from the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetLine hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取一行。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetPosnhdl returns the current I/O position of hdl as a value of the abstract type HandlePosn.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetPosn hdl 返回的当前I / O位置 hdl 为抽象类型的值 HandlePosn 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hLookAhead returns the next character from the handle without removing it from the input buffer, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hLookAhead 从句柄中返回下一个字符，而不将其从输入缓冲区中删除，直到一个字符可用为止，它一直阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutCharhdl ch writes the character ch to the file or channel managed by hdl. Characters may be buffered if buffering is enabled for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutChar hdl ch 写入字符 ch 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。如果为 hdl 启用了缓冲，则可以缓冲字符。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hSeekhdl mode i sets the position of handle hdl depending on mode. The offset i is given in terms of 8-bit bytes.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hSeek hdl mode i 根据 mode 设置手柄 hdl 的位置。偏移量 i 以8位字节的形式给出。

trans-unit.source: Computation hSetBufferinghdl mode sets the mode of buffering for handle hdl on subsequent reads and writes.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hSetBuffering hdl mode 设置在后续读写中为句柄 hdl 缓冲的模式。

trans-unit.source: Computation hTellhdl returns the current position of the handle hdl, as the number of bytes from the beginning of the file. The value returned may be subsequently passed to hSeek to reposition the handle to the current position.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hTell hdl 返回句柄 hdl 的当前位置，作为从文件开头开始的字节数。返回的值可以随后传递给 hSeek 以将手柄重新定位到当前位置。

trans-unit.source: Computation hWaitForInputhdl t waits until input is available on handle hdl. It returns True as soon as input is available on hdl, or False if no input is available within t milliseconds. Note that hWaitForInput waits until one or more full characters are available, which means that it needs to do decoding, and hence may fail with a decoding error.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hWaitForInput hdl t 等待直到输入在句柄 hdl 上可用。它返回 True ，只要输入可用的 hdl ，或 False ，如果没有输入中提供 t 毫秒。请注意， hWaitForInput 等待一个或多个完整字符可用，这意味着它需要进行解码，因此可能会因解码错误而失败。

trans-unit.source: Computation openFilefile mode allocates and returns a new, open handle to manage the file file. It manages input if mode is ReadMode, output if mode is WriteMode or AppendMode, and both input and output if mode is ReadWriteMode.
trans-unit.target: 计算 openFile file mode 分配并返回一个新的打开的句柄来管理文件 file 。它管理如果输入 mode 是 ReadMode ，如果输出 mode 是 WriteMode 或 AppendMode ，和输入和输出，如果模式是 ReadWriteMode 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetCharhdl reads a character from the file or channel managed by hdl, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetChar hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取字符，并阻塞直到有字符可用为止。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetContentshdl returns the list of characters corresponding to the unread portion of the channel or file managed by hdl, which is put into an intermediate state, semi-closed. In this state, hdl is effectively closed, but items are read from hdl on demand and accumulated in a special list returned by hGetContentshdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetContents hdl 返回与由 hdl 管理的通道或文件的未读部分相对应的字符列表，该字符处于半封闭状态，处于中间状态。在这种状态下， hdl 实际上是关闭的，但是根据需要从 hdl 中读取项目，并将其累积在 hGetContents hdl 返回的特殊列表中。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetLinehdl reads a line from the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetLine hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取一行。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutCharhdl ch writes the character ch to the file or channel managed by hdl. Characters may be buffered if buffering is enabled for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutChar hdl ch 写入字符 ch 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。如果为 hdl 启用了缓冲，则可以缓冲字符。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hWaitForInputhdl t waits until input is available on handle hdl. It returns True as soon as input is available on hdl, or False if no input is available within t milliseconds. Note that hWaitForInput waits until one or more full characters are available, which means that it needs to do decoding, and hence may fail with a decoding error.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hWaitForInput hdl t 等待直到输入在句柄 hdl 上可用。它返回 True ，只要输入可用的 hdl ，或 False ，如果没有输入中提供 t 毫秒。请注意， hWaitForInput 等待一个或多个完整字符可用，这意味着它需要进行解码，因此可能会因解码错误而失败。

trans-unit.source: Computation getCPUTime returns the number of picoseconds CPU time used by the current program. The precision of this result is implementation-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 计算 getCPUTime 返回当前程序使用的皮秒CPU时间。此结果的精度取决于实现方式。

trans-unit.source: Computation getArgs returns a list of the program's command line arguments (not including the program name).
trans-unit.target: Computation getArgs 返回程序的命令行参数列表（不包括程序名称）。

trans-unit.source: Computation getEnvvar returns the value of the environment variable var. For the inverse, the setEnv function can be used.
trans-unit.target: 计算 getEnv var 返回环境变量 var 的值。反之，可以使用 setEnv 函数。

trans-unit.source: Computation getEnvvar returns the value of the environment variable var. For the inverse, the setEnv function can be used.
trans-unit.target: 计算 getEnv var 返回环境变量 var 的值。相反，可以使用 setEnv 函数。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation getArgs returns a list of the program's command line arguments (not including the program name).
trans-unit.target: Computation getArgs 返回程序的命令行参数列表（不包括程序名称）。

trans-unit.source: Computation getProgName returns the name of the program as it was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Computation getProgName 返回被调用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPrinthdl t writes the string representation of t given by the shows function to the file or channel managed by hdl and appends a newline.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPrint hdl t 写入的字符串表示 t 由给定 shows 的功能所管理的文件或信道 hdl 并附加一个新行。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutCharhdl ch writes the character ch to the file or channel managed by hdl. Characters may be buffered if buffering is enabled for hdl.

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hReadyhdl indicates whether at least one item is available for input from handle hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hReady hdl 指示是否至少有一项可用于句柄 hdl 的输入。

trans-unit.source: Computation hSeekhdl mode i sets the position of handle hdl depending on mode. The offset i is given in terms of 8-bit bytes.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hSeek hdl mode i 根据 mode 设置手柄 hdl 的位置。偏移量 i 以8位字节的形式给出。

It returns True as soon as input is available on hdl, or False if no input is available within t milliseconds. Note that hWaitForInput waits until one or more full characters are available, which means that it needs to do decoding, and hence may fail with a decoding error.

trans-unit.target: 计算 openFile file mode 分配并返回一个新的打开的句柄来管理文件 file 。它管理如果输入 mode 是 ReadMode ，如果输出 mode 是 WriteMode 或 AppendMode ，和输入和输出，如果模式是 ReadWriteMode 。

trans-unit.target: Computation getArgs 以 ByteString 的形式返回程序命令行参数的列表（不包括程序名称）。

trans-unit.source: Computations are actions that may produce a value or exit.

trans-unit.source: Compute the length of a NUL-terminated string. This address must refer to immutable memory. GHC includes a built-in rule for constant folding when the argument is a statically-known literal. That is, a core-to-core pass reduces the expression cstringLength# "hello"# to the constant 5#.

trans-unit.source: Concurrency is "lightweight", which means that both thread creation and context switching overheads are extremely low. Scheduling of Haskell threads is done internally in the Haskell runtime system, and doesn't make use of any operating system-supplied thread packages.
trans-unit.target: 并发是 "轻量级 "的,这意味着线程创建和上下文切换的开销都极低。Haskell线程的调度是在Haskell运行时系统内部完成的,并没有使用任何操作系统提供的线程包。

trans-unit.source: Concurrent Haskell is the name given to GHC’s concurrency extension. It is enabled by default, so no special flags are required. The Concurrent Haskell paper is still an excellent resource, as is Tackling the awkward squad.

trans-unit.source: Consider the following concurrent data structure, a skip channel. This is a channel for an intermittent source of high bandwidth information (for example, mouse movement events.) Writing to the channel never blocks, and reading from the channel only returns the most recent value, or blocks if there are no new values. Multiple readers are supported with a dupSkipChan operation.
trans-unit.target: 考虑以下并发数据结构，即跳过通道。这是间歇性的高带宽信息源（例如，鼠标移动事件）的通道。写入该通道不会阻塞，从该通道读取只会返回最近的值，如果没有新值，则阻塞。 dupSkipChan 操作支持多个阅读器。

trans-unit.source: Constraints that have been solved by the plugin must be provided with evidence in the form of an EvTerm of the type of the constraint. This evidence is ignored for given and derived constraints, which GHC “solves” simply by discarding them; typically this is used when they are uninformative (e.g. reflexive equations). For wanted constraints, the evidence will form part of the Core term that is generated after typechecking, and can be checked by -dcore-lint. It is possible for the plugin to create equality axioms for use in evidence terms, but GHC does not check their consistency, and inconsistent axiom sets may lead to segfaults or other runtime misbehaviour.
trans-unit.target: 插件已解决的约束必须以约束类型的 EvTerm 形式提供证据。对于给定的和派生的约束，该证据将被忽略，GHC只是通过丢弃它们来“解决”。通常，当它们没有信息时（例如自反方程式），将使用此方法。对于所需的约束，证据将构成类型检查后生成的核心术语的一部分，并且可以由 -dcore-lint 检查。插件有可能创建用于证明的相等公理，但GHC不会检查其一致性，并且公理集不一致可能会导致段错误或其他运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: Control whether the RTS behaviour can be tweaked via command-line flags and the GHCRTS environment variable. Using none means no RTS flags can be given; some means only a minimum of safe options can be given (the default); all (or no argument at all) means that all RTS flags are permitted; ignore means RTS flags can be given, but are treated as regular arguments and passed to the Haskell program as arguments; ignoreAll is the same as ignore, but GHCRTS is also ignored. -rtsopts does not affect -with-rtsopts behavior; flags passed via -with-rtsopts are used regardless of -rtsopts.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否可以通过命令行标志和 GHCRTS 环境变量来调整RTS行为。使用 none 手段没有RTS标志可以给出; some 意味着只能给出最少的安全选项（默认）； all （或完全没有参数）表示允许所有RTS标志； ignore 表示可以给出RTS标志，但是将其视为常规参数并作为参数传递给Haskell程序； ignoreAll 与 ignore 相同，但是 GHCRTS 也被忽略。 -rtsopts 不会影响 -with-rtsopts 的行为；通过 -with-rtsopts 传递的标志不管 -rtsopts 都使用。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, an implementation of foldr for a structure that can accommodate a large (and possibly unbounded) number of elements is expected to be lazy in the tail of the input, allowing operators that are lazy in the accumulator to yield intermediate results incrementally. Such folds are right-associative, with the tail of the stream returned as a lazily evaluated component of the result (an element of a tuple or some other non-strict constructor, e.g. the (:) constructor for lists).
trans-unit.target: 相反，对于可容纳大量（且可能是无界的）元素的结构， foldr 的实现预计在输入的尾部将是惰性的，从而使在累加器中惰性的运算符可以逐步产生中间结果。这样的折叠是右关联的，流的尾部作为结果的惰性评估成分返回（元组的元素或其他一些非严格的构造函数，例如列表的 (:) 构造函数）。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, an implementation of Foldable for a new structure should ensure that foldl` actually performs a strict left-associative reduction.
trans-unit.target: 相反，针对新结构的 Foldable 实现应确保 foldl 实际上执行严格的左联想缩减。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, any entity requested by a signature can be provided by a reexport from the implementing module. This is different from hs-boot files, which require every entity to be defined locally in the implementing module.
trans-unit.target: 相反，签名所请求的任何实体都可以由实现模块中的重新导出来提供。这与 hs-boot 文件不同，后者要求每个实体都在实现模块中本地定义。

trans-unit.source: Convert a path into an absolute path. If the given path is relative, the current directory is prepended and the path may or may not be simplified. trans-unit.source: Convert a path into an absolute path. If the given path is relative, the current directory is prepended and then the combined result is normalized. If the path is already absolute, the path is simply normalized. The function preserves the presence or absence of the trailing path separator unless the path refers to the root directory /.
trans-unit.target: 将路径转换为绝对路径。如果给定路径是相对路径，则在当前目录前添加前缀，然后将合并结果标准化。如果路径已经是绝对路径，则只需对路径进行规范化即可。该函数保留尾随路径分隔符的存在或不存在，除非路径指向根目录 / 。

trans-unit.source: Convert to ISO 8601 Week Date format. First element of result is year, second week number (1-53), third day of week (1 for Monday to 7 for Sunday). Note that "Week" years are not quite the same as Gregorian years, as the first day of the year is always a Monday. The first week of a year is the first week to contain at least four days in the corresponding Gregorian year.
trans-unit.target: 转换为ISO 8601周日期格式。结果的第一个元素是年份,第二个星期号(1-53),第三个星期日(1代表星期一到7代表星期日)。请注意,"周 "年与格里高利年不太一样,因为一年的第一天总是星期一。一年的第一周是指在相应的格里高利年中至少包含4天的第一周。

trans-unit.source: Copy a file with its associated metadata. If the destination file already exists, it is overwritten. There is no guarantee of atomicity in the replacement of the destination file. Neither path may refer to an existing directory. If the source and/or destination are symbolic links, the copy is performed on the targets of the links.
trans-unit.target: 复制一个文件及其相关的元数据。如果目标文件已经存在,则会被覆盖。在替换目标文件的过程中,不能保证原子性。两条路径都不可以引用一个现有的目录。如果源文件和/或目标文件是符号链接,那么复制将在链接的目标文件上进行。

trans-unit.source: Copy a file with its permissions. If the destination file already exists, it is replaced atomically. Neither path may refer to an existing directory. No exceptions are thrown if the permissions could not be copied.
trans-unit.target: 拷贝一个有权限的文件。如果目标文件已经存在,则会被原子地替换。两条路径都不能指向一个现有的目录。如果权限不能被复制,不会产生异常。

trans-unit.source: Copy a memory range starting at the Addr# to the specified range in the MutableByteArray#. The memory region at Addr# and the ByteArray# must fully contain the specified ranges, but this is not checked. The Addr# must not point into the MutableByteArray# (e.g. if the MutableByteArray# were pinned), but this is not checked either.
trans-unit.target: 将从Addr#开始的内存范围复制到MutableByteArray#中的指定范围。Addr#和ByteArray#的内存区域必须完全包含指定的范围,但这并不被检查。Addr#不能指向MutableByteArray#(例如,如果MutableByteArray#被钉住了),但这也不被选中。

trans-unit.source: Copy a range of the ArrayArray# to the specified region in the MutableArrayArray#. Both arrays must fully contain the specified ranges, but this is not checked. The two arrays must not be the same array in different states, but this is not checked either.
trans-unit.target: 将ArrayArray#的一个范围复制到MutableArrayArray#的指定区域。两个数组必须完全包含指定的范围,但这并不被检查。两个数组在不同的状态下必须不是同一个数组,但这也不被检查。

trans-unit.source: Copy a range of the ByteArray# to the memory range starting at the Addr#. The ByteArray# and the memory region at Addr# must fully contain the specified ranges, but this is not checked. The Addr# must not point into the ByteArray# (e.g. if the ByteArray# were pinned), but this is not checked either.
trans-unit.target: 将ByteArray#的一个范围复制到Addr#开始的内存范围。ByteArray#和Addr#处的内存区域必须完全包含指定的范围,但这并不被检查。Addr#不能指向ByteArray#(例如,如果ByteArray#被钉住了),但这也不被选中。

trans-unit.source: Copy a range of the MutableByteArray# to the memory range starting at the Addr#. The MutableByteArray# and the memory region at Addr# must fully contain the specified ranges, but this is not checked. The Addr# must not point into the MutableByteArray# (e.g. if the MutableByteArray# were pinned), but this is not checked either.
trans-unit.target: 将MutableByteArray#的一个范围复制到Addr#开始的内存范围。MutableByteArray#和Addr#处的内存区域必须完全包含指定的范围,但这并不被检查。Addr#不能指向MutableByteArray#(例如,如果MutableByteArray#被钉住了),但这也不被选中。

trans-unit.source: Copy a range of the first MutableArrayArray# to the specified region in the second MutableArrayArray#. Both arrays must fully contain the specified ranges, but this is not checked. The regions are allowed to overlap, although this is only possible when the same array is provided as both the source and the destination.
trans-unit.target: 将第一个MutableArrayArray#的范围复制到第二个MutableArrayArray#的指定区域。两个数组必须完全包含指定的范围,但这并不被检查。虽然只有当源和目标都是同一个数组时,区域才有可能重叠。

trans-unit.source: Correctly instrumented code provides coverage information of two kinds: source coverage and boolean-control coverage. Source coverage is the extent to which every part of the program was used, measured at three different levels: declarations (both top-level and local), alternatives (among several equations or case branches) and expressions (at every level). Boolean coverage is the extent to which each of the values True and False is obtained in every syntactic boolean context (ie. guard, condition, qualifier).
trans-unit.target: 正确的工具化代码提供了两种覆盖率信息:源覆盖率和布尔控制覆盖率。源头覆盖率是指程序的每个部分被使用的程度,从三个不同的层次来衡量:声明(包括顶层和局部)、备选方案(在几个方程或案例分支中)和表达式(在每个层次上)。布尔覆盖率是指在每一个语法布尔上下文(即守备、条件、限定符)中获得True和False两个值的程度。
